languages.text: "Твоя жалость ранит острее, чем клинки кабалита". {n}Ирлиэт чуть отстраняется, потупив взор, но головы не склоняет.{/n} "Я... оступилась. Почти потеряла свой Путь во тьме Темного города, пытаясь достичь того, что до конца не осознавала. Отчаяние затмило мой разум, но ты, элантах, не позволил{mf||а} ему прорасти в моей душе, словно сорному семени. За это... прими мою благодарность".

traits.locale_text: "Твоя жалость ранит острее, чем клинки кабалита". {n}Ирлиэт чуть отстраняется, потупив взор, но головы не склоняет.{/n} "Я... оступилась. Почти потеряла свой Путь во тьме Темного Города, пытаясь достичь того, что до конца не осознавала. Отчаяние затмило мой разум, но ты, элантах, не позволил{mf||а} ему прорасти в моей душе, словно сорному семени. За это... прими мою благодарность".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "The pity in your words wounds deeper than the blades of the Kabalites." {n}Yrliet draws back slightly and lowers her eyes, but does not incline her head.{/n} "I... made a misstep. Almost lost my Path in the blackness of the Dark City, trying to reach something I could not fully grasp. Despair overwhelmed my mind, but you, elantach, did not allow it to take root in my soul like a pestilent weed. For this... I am grateful."

languages.text: “你话语中的怜悯，比阴谋团的利刃更让我感到痛苦。”{n}伊莉耶特微微退了一步，垂下了目光，但并没有低下头。{/n}“我……走错了道路。我在黑暗之城的一片阴暗之中几乎迷失了道路，渴望得到我并未完全掌握的东西。那个时候，绝望吞没了我的思想。但你，外界人，你并没有让它像有害的杂草一样在我的灵魂中生根。对于这一点……我很感激。”
languages.original_text: "The pity in your words wounds deeper than the blades of the Kabalites." {n}Yrliet draws back slightly and lowers her eyes, but does not incline her head.{/n} "I... made a misstep. Almost lost my Path in the blackness of the Dark City, trying to reach something I could not fully grasp. Despair overwhelmed my mind, but you, elantach, did not allow it to take root in my soul like a pestilent weed. For this... I am grateful."

traits.locale_text: “你话语中的怜悯，比阴谋团的利刃更让我感到痛苦。”{n}伊莉耶特微微退了一步，垂下了目光，但并没有低下头。{/n}“我……走错了道路。我在黑暗之城的一片阴暗之中几乎迷失了道路，渴望得到我并未完全掌握的东西。那个时候，绝望吞没了我的思想。但你，外界人，你并没有让它像有害的杂草一样在我的灵魂中生根。对于这一点……我很感激。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "The pity in your words wounds deeper than the blades of the Kabalites." {n}Yrliet draws back slightly and lowers her eyes, but does not incline her head.{/n} "I... made a misstep. Almost lost my Path in the blackness of the Dark City, trying to reach something I could not fully grasp. Despair overwhelmed my mind, but you, elantach, did not allow it to take root in my soul like a pestilent weed. For this... I am grateful."

languages.text: «La lástima de tus palabras hiere más que las hojas de los kabalistas». {n}Yrliet retrocede ligeramente y baja la mirada, pero no agacha la cabeza.{/n} «He... cometido un error. Casi perdí mi Senda en la negrura de la Ciudad Siniestra, intentando alcanzar algo que no podía comprender. La desesperación se apoderó de mi mente, pero tú, elantach, no permitiste que arraigara en mi alma como un hierbajo pestilente. Por eso... te doy las gracias».
languages.original_text: "The pity in your words wounds deeper than the blades of the Kabalites." {n}Yrliet draws back slightly and lowers her eyes, but does not incline her head.{/n} "I... made a misstep. Almost lost my Path in the blackness of the Dark City, trying to reach something I could not fully grasp. Despair overwhelmed my mind, but you, elantach, did not allow it to take root in my soul like a pestilent weed. For this... I am grateful."

traits.locale_text: «La lástima de tus palabras hiere más que las hojas de los kabalistas». {n}Yrliet retrocede ligeramente y baja la mirada, pero no agacha la cabeza.{/n} «He... cometido un error. Casi perdí mi Senda en la negrura de la Ciudad Siniestra, intentando alcanzar algo que no podía comprender. La desesperación se apoderó de mi mente, pero tú, elantach, no permitiste que arraigara en mi alma como un hierbajo pestilente. Por eso... te doy las gracias».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「お前の言葉に込められた哀れみには、カバライトの刃よりも深い傷を負わされそうだ」{n}ユリエットはわずかに後ずさりし、目を伏せるが、首を傾げることはない。{/n}「我は…道を誤った。仄暗き都の暗闇の中で、自分の道を見失いそうになった。掴むことのできぬ何かに手を伸ばそうとした。絶望が我の心を覆い尽くしたが、エランタよ、お前はそれが疫病の雑草のように我の魂に根付くことを許さなかった。このことに…感謝している」
languages.original_text: "The pity in your words wounds deeper than the blades of the Kabalites." {n}Yrliet draws back slightly and lowers her eyes, but does not incline her head.{/n} "I... made a misstep. Almost lost my Path in the blackness of the Dark City, trying to reach something I could not fully grasp. Despair overwhelmed my mind, but you, elantach, did not allow it to take root in my soul like a pestilent weed. For this... I am grateful."

traits.locale_text: 「お前の言葉に込められた哀れみには、カバライトの刃よりも深い傷を負わされそうだ」{n}ユリエットはわずかに後ずさりし、目を伏せるが、首を傾げることはない。{/n}「我は…道を誤った。仄暗き都の暗闇の中で、自分の道を見失いそうになった。掴むことのできぬ何かに手を伸ばそうとした。絶望が我の心を覆い尽くしたが、エランタよ、お前はそれが疫病の雑草のように我の魂に根付くことを許さなかった。このことに…感謝している」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Das Mitleid in Euren Worten verwundet mich tiefer als die Klingen einer Kabale." {n}Yrliet weicht ein wenig zurück und senkt den Blick, neigt jedoch den Kopf nicht.{/n} "Ich ... habe einen Fehltritt begangen. Ich wäre in der Schwärze der Dunklen Stadt um ein Haar von meinem Pfad abgekommen, weil ich etwas erreichen wollte, was ich nicht verstand. Verzweiflung überwältigte meinen Verstand, doch Ihr, Elantach, habt nicht zugelassen, dass sie in meiner Seele Wurzeln schlägt wie ein wucherndes Unkraut. Dafür ... bin ich Euch dankbar."
languages.original_text: "The pity in your words wounds deeper than the blades of the Kabalites." {n}Yrliet draws back slightly and lowers her eyes, but does not incline her head.{/n} "I... made a misstep. Almost lost my Path in the blackness of the Dark City, trying to reach something I could not fully grasp. Despair overwhelmed my mind, but you, elantach, did not allow it to take root in my soul like a pestilent weed. For this... I am grateful."

traits.locale_text: "Das Mitleid in Euren Worten verwundet mich tiefer als die Klingen einer Kabale." {n}Yrliet weicht ein wenig zurück und senkt den Blick, neigt jedoch den Kopf nicht.{/n} "Ich ... habe einen Fehltritt begangen. Ich wäre in der Schwärze der Dunklen Stadt um ein Haar von meinem Pfad abgekommen, weil ich etwas erreichen wollte, was ich nicht verstand. Verzweiflung überwältigte meinen Verstand, doch Ihr, Elantach, habt nicht zugelassen, dass sie in meiner Seele Wurzeln schlägt wie ein wucherndes Unkraut. Dafür ... bin ich Euch dankbar."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « La pitié que je perçois dans votre voix tranche plus profondément que les lames des Kabalites. » {n}Yrliet recule légèrement et baisse les yeux, sans toutefois incliner la tête.{/n} « J'ai... commis une erreur. J'ai failli perdre ma Voie dans la noirceur de la Cité Crépusculaire, en essayant d'atteindre quelque chose que je ne comprenais pas vraiment. Le désespoir a submergé mon esprit, mais vous, elantach, ne lui avez pas permis de s'enraciner dans mon âme comme une herbe envahissante. De cela... je vous suis reconnaissante. »
languages.original_text: "The pity in your words wounds deeper than the blades of the Kabalites." {n}Yrliet draws back slightly and lowers her eyes, but does not incline her head.{/n} "I... made a misstep. Almost lost my Path in the blackness of the Dark City, trying to reach something I could not fully grasp. Despair overwhelmed my mind, but you, elantach, did not allow it to take root in my soul like a pestilent weed. For this... I am grateful."

traits.locale_text: « La pitié que je perçois dans votre voix tranche plus profondément que les lames des Kabalites. » {n}Yrliet recule légèrement et baisse les yeux, sans toutefois incliner la tête.{/n} « J'ai... commis une erreur. J'ai failli perdre ma Voie dans la noirceur de la Cité Crépusculaire, en essayant d'atteindre quelque chose que je ne comprenais pas vraiment. Le désespoir a submergé mon esprit, mais vous, elantach, ne lui avez pas permis de s'enraciner dans mon âme comme une herbe envahissante. De cela... je vous suis reconnaissante. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Sözlerinde saklı acıma, Kabalist bıçaklarından bile derine saplanıyor." {n}Yrliet, hafifçe geri çekilerek bakışlarını yere kenetliyor ancak kafasını çevirmiyor.{/n} "Ben... Bir hata yaptım. Kara Şehir'in karanlığında, tamamen kavrayamadığım bir şeye ulaşmaya çalışırken Yolumu neredeyse kaybettim. Zihnimi dayanılmaz bir keder kapladı ama elantach... Sen bu kederin zararlı ot misali ruhumda kök salmasına müsaade etmedin. Bundandır ki... Sana minnettarım."
languages.original_text: "The pity in your words wounds deeper than the blades of the Kabalites." {n}Yrliet draws back slightly and lowers her eyes, but does not incline her head.{/n} "I... made a misstep. Almost lost my Path in the blackness of the Dark City, trying to reach something I could not fully grasp. Despair overwhelmed my mind, but you, elantach, did not allow it to take root in my soul like a pestilent weed. For this... I am grateful."

Bir hata yaptım. Kara Şehir'in karanlığında, tamamen kavrayamadığım bir şeye ulaşmaya çalışırken Yolumu neredeyse kaybettim. Zihnimi dayanılmaz bir keder kapladı ama elantach...
